meanings.sent1: After many years of relaxation, he unretires to work again.
meanings.sent2: She unretires from her job to pursue a new passion.
meanings.sent3: The retired superhero unretires to save the day once more.
meanings.sent4: Like a phoenix rising from the ashes, he unretires to show his skills.
meanings.sent5: The old musician unretires, filling the air with beautiful melodies once more.

meanings.sent1: The athlete unretires to compete in the championship.
meanings.sent2: She unretires her position as CEO after a brief break.
meanings.sent3: The retired detective unretires to solve one last mystery.
meanings.sent4: The old car unretires its engine after years of rest.
meanings.sent5: The teacher unretires her teaching career to inspire a new generation.
